package main
import "fmt"
import "time"
func sender(ch chan int){
    for i:=0;i<100;i++{
        ch<-i
        time.Sleep(time.MillSecond)
        //ch<-i+1
    }
}

func main() {

    ch:=make(chan int)
    go sender(ch)

    for {
        data,ok:=<-ch
        if ok!=nil {
            fmt.Println("data=",data)

            if data==50 {
                break
            }

       }

        else {
        fmt.Println("No data")
        }
    }

    fmt.Println("Done")
}
